documentContentReferences.name: Reference to SoA and Section 8
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from the amendment summary table to the Schedule of Activities (Table 1) and Section 8 regarding procedures specific to US screening sites.

documentContentReferences.name: COVID-19 Vaccine Risk Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 2.3.1.1 to Section 10.5 for potential risks and mitigation measures due to the COVID-19 vaccine.

documentContentReferences.name: Dose Modification Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Table 3 (Potential Risks and Mitigation Strategy) to Section 6.6 for dose modification or discontinuation as a mitigation strategy.

documentContentReferences.name: Adaptive Features Table Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 4.1 to Table 4, which describes the adaptive design features of the study.

documentContentReferences.name: Dose Modification Criteria Table Reference
documentContentReferences.sectionTitle: ALXN1840 Dose Modifications for Individual Participants
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Table 4 (Adaptive Protocol Features) to Table 7, which outlines the criteria for dose modification.

documentContentReferences.name: Exclusion Criteria Reference for Blood Donation
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Table 5 (Lifestyle Considerations) to Section 5.2 regarding restrictions on blood donation prior to screening.

documentContentReferences.name: Contraceptive Guidance Reference
documentContentReferences.sectionTitle: Contraceptive Guidance and Collection of Pregnancy Information
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Table 5 (Lifestyle Considerations) to Section 10.4 for details on appropriate contraceptive methods.

documentContentReferences.name: Inclusion Criteria Reference for Contraception
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Table 5 (Lifestyle Considerations) to Section 5.1 for start times of contraceptive methods.

documentContentReferences.name: SoA Reference for Intervention Discontinuation
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 7.1 to the SoA for data to be collected at the time of study intervention discontinuation.

documentContentReferences.name: Pregnancy Discontinuation Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 7.1 to Section 8.2.6 regarding discontinuation from study intervention due to pregnancy.

documentContentReferences.name: SoA Reference for Participant Withdrawal
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 7.2 to the SoA for data to be collected at the time of participant discontinuation/withdrawal from the study.

documentContentReferences.name: QTc Withdrawal Criteria Reference
documentContentReferences.sectionTitle: DISCONTINUATION OF STUDY INTERVENTION AND PARTICIPANT DISCONTINUATION/WITHDRAWAL
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 8.2.3 to Section 7 for QTc withdrawal criteria.

documentContentReferences.name: Clinical Laboratory Tests Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 8.2.4 to Section 10.2 for the list of clinical laboratory tests to be performed.

documentContentReferences.name: AE/SAE Procedures Reference
documentContentReferences.sectionTitle: Adverse Events: Definitions and Procedures for Recording, Evaluating, Follow-up, and Reporting
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 8.3 to Section 10.3 for procedures on recording, evaluating, and reporting AEs and SAEs.

documentContentReferences.name: Lost to Follow-up Definition Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 8.3.3 to Section 7.3 for the definition of 'lost to follow-up'.

documentContentReferences.name: Genetic Testing Clarification Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 8.3.6 to Section 8.7 to clarify that biobanked samples will not be used for genetic testing.

documentContentReferences.name: Molybdenum Measurement Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 8.5 to Section 8.1.1 for details of molybdenum measured in food, drinks, urine, and feces.

documentContentReferences.name: Biomarker Details Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 8.8 to Section 8.6 for details on specific biomarkers like total copper and ceruloplasmin.

documentContentReferences.name: Analysis Populations Table Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 9.3 to Table 8, which defines the population sets for analysis.

documentContentReferences.name: SoA Table Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference to the Schedule of Activities table for timing of various assessments (e.g., PK, PD, ECGs).

commentAnnotations.text: Addition of text to the footnote to state that procedures specific to screening sites (only in the US) detailed in Section 8
commentAnnotations.sourceSection: PROTOCOL AMENDMENT SUMMARY OF CHANGES TABLE
Table 3: Potential Risks and Mitigation Strategy

commentAnnotations.text: Note: total molybdenum and PUF molybdenum concentration-time profiles on Day 28 after the last 15 mg ALXN1840 dose will be extrapolated to Day 29 (0-24 hr) and subtracted from the observed Day 29 concentration-time profiles after the first 30 mg

studyDefinitionDocumentVersions.description: Clarify study procedures across US sites to facilitate recruitment and lessen inconvenience for participants.
